title: no prize no rice
body:
Hello, i just recieved an interesting email that shocked me.
To start, probably 3 days ago i played a 5v5 tournament with my mates and we finished 3rd but our oponnents surrendered the match for 3rd place.
As i mentioned before, i recieved and email where riot said: "This event is incomplete. We found no evidence of the most crucial games being played.
I'm sorry to inform you that your tournament is ineligible for prize. We are unable to support it."
So this got me angry and till now i still cant udnerstand how riot meant that. So our enemies refused to play and riot is gonna punish everybody ? Really ?
Im not writing this to get rewards or some stuff just wanna let the comunity and admins know that im not satisfied with riots decisions lately not only with this one.
PS: I hope I found the right sub-section this time, im dont really come to the forum often {{champion:24}}

replies.body:
I'm sorry to hear you aren't satisfied with your tournament's outcome. If you'd like additional context on this decision, I recommend submitting a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so one of our specialists can clarify this for you.

Let me know if you have any issues submitting that ticket.
